enum.name: RIOT_CMD_SHORT_ID
enum.description: Type of NXP Rapid IoT parameter request.

entry.name: RIOT_CMD_SHORT_RQST_AIR_QUALITY
entry.description: RIOT CMD to retrieve Air Quality.

entry.name: RIOT_CMD_SHORT_RQST_TEMPERATURE
entry.description: RIOT CMD to retrieve on-board sensor's temperature.

entry.name: RIOT_CMD_SHORT_RQST_SENSOR_COMBINED
entry.description: RIOT CMD to retrieve on-board sensor data combined.

enum.name: RIOT_CMD_LONG_ID
enum.description: Type of NXP Rapid IoT parameter request.

entry.name: RIOT_CMD_LONG_A100X_GETUID
entry.description: RIOT CMD to retrieve on-board A1006 Secure Authenticator's stored UID.

entry.name: RIOT_CMD_LONG_A100X_GETCERTIFICATE
entry.description: RIOT CMD to retrieve on-board A1006 Secure Authenticator's stored UID. Use param_index to choose between NXP / User certificate.

entry.name: RIOT_CMD_LONG_A100X_SETCHALLENGE
entry.description: RIOT CMD to send a challenge to the on-board A1006 Secure Authenticator. This is the first step in the ECCAuthenticate process.

entry.name: RIOT_CMD_LONG_A100X_GETCHALLENGE
entry.description: RIOT CMD to request a challenge response from the on-board A1006 Secure Authenticator. This is the second step in the ECCAuthenticate.

entry.name: RIOT_CMD_LONG_SET_AIR_QUALITY_OFFSET
entry.description: RIOT CMD to update the on-board air-quality sensor calibration offset, an int16_t in little endian placed in 'data'.

entry.name: RIOT_CMD_LONG_SET_HUMIDITY_OFFSET
entry.description: RIOT CMD to update the on-board humidity sensor calibration offset, a float32_t in little endian placed in 'data'.

entry.name: RIOT_CMD_LONG_SET_TEMPERATURE_OFFSET
entry.description: RIOT CMD to update the on-board temperature sensor calibration offset, a float32_t in little endian placed in 'data'.

message.name: RIOT_CMD
message.description: Send commands towards NXP's Rapid IoT module.
message.field: System ID of target system this message is for.
Component ID of target Rapid IoT this message is for.

message.name: RIOT_CMD_LONG
message.description: Send commands towards NXP's Rapid IoT module.
message.field: System ID of target system this message is for.
Component ID of target Rapid IoT this message is for.
RIOT Command related data such as an A100x Challenge value.

message.name: RIOT_RESPONSE
message.description: Response sent by NXP's Rapid IoT module. Designed to fit combined sensor data of air-quality, humidity and temperature.
message.field: RIOT Short Command ID the response is for.
Unsigned integer value for air quality sensor data. Value typically between 400 and 8000.
Floating point value for humidity sensor data.
Floating point value for temperature sensor data.

message.name: RIOT_RESPONSE_LONG
message.description: Response sent by NXP's Rapid IoT module for long replies containing e.g. an A100x Certificate, Challenge or UID.
message.field: RIOT Long Command ID the response is for.
Data array of size 128 bytes to allow for returning bigger data such as the A100x Certificate.
